about_the_game:
If a heroine takes damage, her costume will be broken little by little.
If she loses, she will be sexed up.
She can buy items for free by having sex in the store
When you complete each heroine's story, you can see their daily sex acts.


  • Princess Petorine takes back the castle.
  • The wizard Melona pursues her master.
  • The kunoichi Kuno chases after the stolen Book of Secrets.
  • Rosalie, the dark elf who protects the elf village.
Each of the four protagonists has a story to tell.


Strengthen your skills by defeating enemies and shopping in a shop!
Even if you don't have any money, you can still shop by part-time job.

Prorogue

Princess Petorine wakes up with a great tremor.
A curse overflows the sealed door and possesses the soldiers.
She escapes from the castle in the nick of time and meets companions who help her.
The adventure to reclaim the castle begins.

content_descriptors.notes:
There's sexual violence.
There are sex without consent.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

short_description: A roguelike action game in which beautiful sexual girls fight against hordes of hordes to reclaim their castle. Strengthen her skills during the battle or enhance them in a shop. Become stronger and defeat their enemies.
